content: I hadn’t really thought about how easy it would be for Facebook to integrate functionality like LinkedIn. I think you bring up a very good point. personally, I’m trying to spend less time on Facebook and don’t really like what I see when I am on there. It is so hard to not use it though when I get some good out of it and am able to connect with friends and events that I may have missed otherwise. LinkedIn serves a different purpose for me and I can’t imagine how Facebook my capture my attention when I have a negative image of them at this point.
